name: musky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or smelling of musk (= a substance with a strong, sweet smell): Her skin had a warm musky odour. A faint musky scent lingered in the air. See
musk
More examplesFewer examplesSoon the room smells sweet and musky.Her musky perfume followed her down the aisle.You don’t taste the cinnamon as much as inhale its musky fragrance.
